rules_text:
Choose one –
• Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Will of Chaos.
• Will of Chaos deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life.
• Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
Entwine {UB}{BR} [i](Choose all if you pay the entwine cost.)[/i]
